idea-plugin.name: Java DTO to TS Interface
idea-plugin.description:
Adds support for converting Java DTO files to TypeScript interface files
Usage instructions : After this plugin is installed, right click on a Java DTO file or a Java entity file, click a menu item called '(→ . →) Java DTO to TypeScript interface', choose a folder to save the TS interface file, then open the folder and check the result file 
public class TestRequest {
      /**
           * name list
           */
      @NotNull
      private String nameArray[];
      private List 《String》 names;

      private Boolean isRunning;

      private boolean isSuccess;

      }

Result => TestRequest.d.ts

export default interface TestRequest{
      /**
        * name list
        */
      nameArray: string[]

      names?: string[]

      isRunning?: boolean

      isSuccess?: boolean
      }
